name: O365CopilotLicenseOptimization
description: O365 Copilot License Optimization - Fetch all users license type across O365 Platform.
author: Aammir Mirza
releaseNotes: Script task consistency. Added support for macOS and Linux.

inputs.name: inactiveDaysThreshold
inputs.label: Inactive Days Threshold
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the number of inactive days to consider for user license evaluation.

inputs.name: Revoke
inputs.label: Revoke Licenses Switch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify whether to revoke user licenses for optimization.

messages.JS_InvalidErrorActionPreference: Invalid ErrorActionPreference '%s'. The value must be one of: 'Stop', or 'SilentlyContinue'
